items.title: SANTORINI
items.description: SANTORINI TEXT
items.excerpt: SANTORINI

items.title: Aquaria Villa
items.description:
Welcome to Aquaria Villa Santorini

If you are looking for a shelter of calm, luxury and comfort in Santorini, Aquaria Villa is the perfect accommodation for you. It can host large families and parties of friends or wedding receptions in an inspiring setting filled with light and designed especially to combine modernity and Cycladic tradition.

The highlight of the property though, is the small and picturesque St’Catherine’s church where you may realize your wedding ceremony and afterwards celebrate these precious moments with your friends and relatives at the garden that can host up to 200 persons! The smallest members of the family will find their own paradise at the lovely playground that is the perfect addition to this amazing villa.

Undeniably, there are a lot of reasons that will make it challenging to leave the idyllic surroundings of this place. Especially in the evenings when the cool breeze accompanies you, it is time to gather in one of the three outside lounges with your loved ones and relax, having the time of your life!

Welcome to Aquaria Villa and enjoy your vacations in Santorini, staying at one of the most wonderful places to be!.
items.excerpt: Welcome to Aquaria Villa Santorini  If you are looking for a shelter of calm, luxury and comfort in Santorini, Aquaria Villa is the perfect accommodation for you.

amenities.item: Daily Cleaning Services upon request (extra charge)

tabs.title: Good to Know:
tabs.description: Check in: 16:00 – Check out: 10:00

items.title: Ayoba Santorini
items.description:
Welcome to Ayoba Santorini

Ayoba is ideally nested in the beautiful village of Imerovigli, just steps from the cascading caldera and close to the bustling capital of Fira. Ayoba is not a formal word. It’s a made-up one that originates from the townships of South Africa where it’s used to express appreciation of good dancing! Experience the grace and beauty of Ayoba Santorini, authentic accommodation in the heart of exquisite Imerovigli village, one of the most romantic and picturesque spots on Earth.

Ayoba is not a formal word. It’s a made-up one that originates from the townships of South Africa where it’s used to express appreciation of good dancing! It is slang for “cool, alright, ok”. In Zulu, it means “will be”. Ayoba is a feel-good word. It takes us to our a happy place. A place that’s more than alright actually, better then cool: the ravishing slice of Santorini. Experience the grace and beauty of Ayoba Santorini, authentic accommodation in the heart of exquisite Imerovigli village, one of the most romantic and picturesque spots on Earth. The secluded location of Ayoba will evoke your senses as you peacefully surrender to the ageless spell of Santorini.
items.excerpt: Ayoba is ideally nested in the beautiful village of Imerovigli, just steps from the cascading caldera and close to the bustling capital of Fira.

amenities.item: An authentic accommodation in the heart of exquisite Imerovigli village, Santorini island
Consisting of two suites and four double studios

tabs.title: Good To Know
tabs.description: Ayoba is ideally nested in the beautiful village of Imerovigli, just steps from the cascading caldera and close to the bustling capital of Fira.

items.title: White Harmony Suites Santorini
items.description:
White Harmony Suites is a newly built boutique hotel with only 5 Suites, in the beautiful traditional village of Megalochori

IN A TRADITIONAL SETTLEMENT OF THE ISLAND, MEGALOCHORI, 4 BRAND NEW SUITES OFFER LUXURY AND COMFORTABLE ACCOMMODATION IN NATURE.

They have been created with utmost respect to the environment, following the traditional Theran architecture with modern touches of supreme aesthetics.

Bright colors are prevalent in decor, reflecting natural light bathing their interior. Two of them come with exterior Jacuzzi, while the rest have access to a private swimming pool. The luxurious amenities and the cordial services create the idyllic atmosphere and ensure the optimal holiday experience for you.

White Harmony Suites is the ultimate destination of relaxation in santorini 

Let us introduce you to unpretentious luxury’ splendidly combined with the island’s natural beauty and its unique character.
items.excerpt: White Harmony Suites is a newly built boutique hotel with only 5 Suites, in the beautiful traditional village of Megalochori

amenities.item: Located in the traditional village of Megalochori

items.title: Dreams Luxury Suites
items.description:
Welcome to Dreams Luxury Suites

Our most luxurious offer, the Dreams Luxury Suites, are four suites in beautifully renovated cave houses, each with a unique personality combining courteous and warm service with authentic tradition. Three of the suites have a private pool and jacuzzi, and the Nefeli suite has just a jacuzzi.

4 Suites Dreams luxury suites have stayed true to the original style of the island and represent an inimitable sample of traditional Greek archi-tecture. These original houses were built more than 100 years ago, and restored in 2008.

Dreams Luxury Suites is the place where style, luxury, and perfection meet a world of beauty and tradition. The offered accommodation options represent a new concept of sanctuary with a unique personality. 

The Suites were designed for the distinctive guest who is able to appreciate a singular kind of comfort, class, space and tranquility.

These original houses, more than 100 years old,  have been restored and they incorporate modern amenities, while preserving the traditional architecture.
items.excerpt: Our most luxurious offer, the Dreams Luxury Suites, are four suites in beautifully renovated cave houses, each with a unique personality combining courteous and warm service with authentic tradition.

amenities.item: All suites with magnificent view to the Aegean sea, volcano and sunset
Especially for honeymooners: room decoration with candles and rose petals, one bottle of champagne upon arrival.

tabs.title: Good To Know
tabs.description: Dreams Luxury Suites is the place where style, luxury, and perfection meet a world of beauty and tradition.

items.title: Above Blue Suites
items.description:
Welcome to Above Blue Suites

Above the endless Aegean blue, under the most majestic sunset and with a view of one of the planet’ s most energized volcano.

Above Blue Suites represents a new concept of sanctuary where ten suites perched in the highest point of the stiff cliffs, facing the endless blue of the Aegean Sea, combine harmonically the unique architecture of the famous Santorinian caves, with the sophisticated luxury and the particular decoration, offering generously a truly romantic atmosphere.

Suites are different in size and formation while an endless palette of coloring combinations offers to each one a unique personality and a singular style.

Each suite offers stunning views to the Caldera, Thirassia, the volcano and the village of Oia.

Hospitality reaches new heights at Santorini’s latest landmark; a top-notch cluster of uber elegant suites scattered on a steep rocky slope of the island’s famous Caldera, subtly linked with luring steps to form a delightful hamlet. 

The ten individually designed colour-coded suites, complemented by a secluded exclusive villa, are housed in some of the island’s immaculately restored signature caves and exude a feeling of intimacy, exclusive luxury and local allure, while ideally bridging the awe-inspiring sleeping volcano with romantic sunsets.
items.excerpt: Above Blue Suites represents a new concept of sanctuary where ten suites perched in the highest point of the stiff cliffs, facing the endless blue of the Aegean Sea, combine harmonically the unique architecture of the famous Santorinian caves, with the sophisticated luxury and the particular decoration, offering generously a truly romantic atmosphere.

amenities.item: All suites with magnificent view to the Aegean sea, volcano, sunset and village of Oia
Especially for honeymooners: room decoration with candles and rose petals, one bottle of champagne upon arrival
Champagne glasses on the first sunsets

tabs.title: Good to Know:
tabs.description: Above the endless Aegean blue, under the most majestic sunset and with a view of one of the planet’ s most energized volcano.

items.title: Art Hotel Santorini
items.description:
Welcome to Art Hotel Santorini

Art Hotel in Pyrgos village in Santorini adopted Vincent Van Gogh words in order to paint the dream hotel: “I dream my painting and then I paint my dream”. For adults and gay oriented, Art hotel is design for those who love elegance, luxury, style and they are passionate for discovering the art.

Art Hotel has elegant minimalistic all-white suites highlighting the artworks within each room. At the hotel you will also find a reception that is available 24 hours a day.

As for the children? You are most encouraged to leave them back home for a few days and feel the carefree breeze of Santorini with nothing getting in the way!

The elegant buildings stretch round the refreshing central swimming pool, promoting a private environment where the guests can mingle and get to know one another in the most wonderful atmosphere while on vacations. Socialising is part of the decor and those who are interested in meeting new and fascinating people are going to love Art Hotel.
items.excerpt: Aqua Vista Hotel's Art Hotel Santorini, has elegant all-white suites, each one highlighting artworks. Bespoke services of the finest quality are available.

tabs.title: Good To Know
tabs.description: Check in: 15:00 – Check out: 11:00

items.title: A&V Luxury Villa
items.description:
Welcome to A&V Luxury Villa

Located in the heart of Santorini, a few kilometers from Fira, the capital of the island, A&V villa is the perfect location for those seeking peace, luxury and comfort.

Spacious and modern, built on three levels with an outstanding sea view infinity pool, the villa offers privacy, without sacrificing the comforts found in a five-star hotel. It is the ideal setting for a lifetime trip for family get-togethers and parties of friends.

THE INDOOR: Bright ample rooms are the main characteristic of the villa.

Two fully equipped kitchens, a large living room and an elegant dining room allow the guests to gather and enjoy a traditional meal in the cozy atmosphere of the villa away from the daily crowd.

Four comfortable bedrooms, each one featuring a king size bed and three fully renovated bathrooms (one for each level) are the perfect compromise to combine some privacy with the advantage of sharing a private luxury home with your love ones.

THE OUTDOOR: The outdoor area features a private infinity pool, full sea views on the East coast of the island and an astonishing sunrise. A shaded lounge area under a pergola and sun beds and outdoor lighting for moonlight dinners.
items.excerpt: Aqua Vista's A&V Luxury Villa is a spacious and modern villa built on 3 levels with an outstanding sea view infinity pool. Perfect for family gatherings!

tabs.title: Good To Know
tabs.description: Located in the heart of Santorini, a few kilometers from Fira, the capital of the island, A&V villa is the perfect location for those seeking peace, luxury and comfort.

items.title: Above Blue Villa Santorini
items.description:
Welcome to Above Blue Villa Santorini

The view to the stiff cliffs and the village of Oia is breathtaking during the day, while in the afternoon hours the direct view to the world’s most famous sunset is unbeatable.

Feel the ultimate luxury in this cave villa by having your own private plunge pool with Jacuzzi jets. The view to the stiff cliffs and the village of Oia is breathtaking during the day, while in the afternoon hours the direct view to the world’s most famous sunset is unbeatable.

The Above Blue Villa is made for those who want to enjoy the extra space and all the comforts that a superb villa like this can offer. Sun loungers in the spacious patio, sauna room, a double day bed, your personal notebook, three sitting areas, wireless Internet and much more. The main Bedroom is attached to a very convenient sitting area and has direct access to the master bathroom with the marbled mosaic dressed shower.

The second area consists of a living room, a cozy loft bedroom and a second bathroom with shower. For extra comfort there is a third area that the sauna room is located and also a second small loft with the double day bed. 

From a small cozy lounge you can exit directly into the private plunge pool.Ideal for families with teens, or even for two couples, since a connecting door is totally separating the two areas while both of them have direct access to the patio.

During spring and fall, the pool water can be heated with an extra fee. (24 Hours notice is required). Relax in the shade under the umbrella or lazy lay to the day bed without missing the view to the pool, the cliffs and Oia.Located 50m next to the main hotel building, this unique Villa is the absolute experience that someone can have.
items.excerpt: Aqua Vista Hotel's Above Blue Villa Santorini is a luxury villa in the picturesque village of Imerovigli. Enjoy a private pool & views of the sea and Oia.

amenities.item: Tailor made services prior to arrival
Villa is suitable for honeymooners as well as families of up to 6 guests
Champagne glasses on the first sunset

tabs.title: Good To Know
tabs.description: Check-in: 02.00 pm – Check-out: 12.00 pm – 24 hour reception Non smoking Hotel – Free Wi-Fi

items.intro_text: Welcome to Above Blue Villa Santorini

items.title: Aliko Luxury Suites
items.description:
Aliko Luxury Suites are ideal for couples seeking suites accommodation with sea view on the awe-inspiring Santorini Island, in Greece. Located on the most privileged spot of the island, in the scenic village of Imerovigli, at the highest point of the world-famous volcanic Caldera, they offer from all angles an alluring sea view of the Aegean Sea, a big part of Santorini, the neighbouring islands, and the stunning Caldera.

Being the best choice for suites accommodation in Imerovigli, Aliko Luxury Suites guarantee an unforgettable romantic escape for couples. In a splendid exclusive setting, admiring the fascinating sea view, you will feel like the blessed inhabitants of a private paradise.

Design is slick and minimal while staying true to the traditional style and not compromising on the extra touches that put these suites among the very best luxury accommodations on Santorini.
items.excerpt: Aliko Luxury Suites are ideal for couples seeking suites accommodation with sea view on the awe-inspiring Santorini Island, in Greece.

amenities.item: All suites with magnificent view to the Aegean sea, volcano and sunset
Complimentary champagne glasses on the first sunset

tabs.title: Good to Know:
tabs.description: Aliko Luxury Suites are ideal for couples seeking suites accommodation with sea view on the awe-inspiring Santorini Island, in Greece.

items.title: Alta Vista Suites Santorini
items.description:
Welcome to Alta Vista Suites Santorini

For those wanting to take the concept of private lavishness one step further, the beautiful island of Santorini may have the answer, in the form of Alta Vista Suites – housing five honeymoon suites on the caldera’s edge, offering a unique accommodation experience.

The Suites present a balance of comfort, and unparalleled style. Great attention has been given to the exterior design. The result is a unique combination of the traditional Cycladic style with a blend of modern comfort. All five Honeymoon suites are facing the sea and consist of comfortable king size beds in a cozy and modern atmosphere.

Outside, the iconic perfect setting, will help you rediscover pure joy and complete relaxation with a swimming pool and a built in eating area cave style, and breathtaking views of the Caldera, the volcano and the Imerovigli village.
items.excerpt: For those wanting to take the concept of private lavishness one step further, the beautiful island of Santorini may have the answer, in the form of Alta Vista Suites.

amenities.item: All Suites with magnificent View to the Aegean Sea, Volcano, Sunset and Firostefani Village

tabs.title: Good to Know:
tabs.description: The Suites present a balance of comfort, and unparalleled style.

items.intro_text: Welcome to Alta Vista Suites Santorini

items.title: Amber Light Villas
items.description:
Welcome to Amber Light Villas

Curved in the mountain, the Amber Light Villas offers the combination of comfortable villas opening to private terraces and balconies with stunning views to the Aegean Sea along with the hotel comforts, services and facilities. Amber Light Villas are located on the east side of the famous village of Imerovigli, just above the beaches of Koloumbos and Pori. It is Just 6 km from Fira, 13 km from the airport, km from the port.

Welcome to Santorini and Amber Light Villas. Welcome to a brand new suites complex with hotel facilities at the east side of the island! Inspired by the amber light of the sun rising above the sea just in front of your suite, we created a holiday treat for all your senses.

The comfort, the unique allure of the landscape, the privacy, the tastes and the spa treatments are just some of the elements that will make your holidays in Santorini utterly beautiful and unforgettable.
items.excerpt: Curved in the mountain, the Amber Light Villas offers the combination of comfortable villas opening to private terraces and balconies with stunning views to the Aegean Sea along with the hotel comforts, services and facilities.

amenities.item: 21 independent and private suites and villas
Fresh water Swimming pool with sun-loungers

tabs.title: Good to Know:
tabs.description: Amber Light Villas are located on the east side of the famous village of Imerovigli, just above the beaches of Koloumbos and Pori.

items.title: Anna Traditional Apartments Santorini
items.description:
Welcome to Anna Traditional Apartments Santorini

Tucked away in the heart of Kamari and just a stone’s throw from one of Santorini’s longest and most popular black sand beaches, the exuberant Acqua Vatos smoothly combines the charms of a family beach hotel, a romantic sanctuary and a cosmopolitan retreat.

Anna Traditional Apartments is a complex of fully furnished traditional homes and build with love & respect to the island’s tradition and architecture. Wood and stone are the main structure of the apartments and the Greek spirit is everywhere.

Anna Traditional Apartments has a large swimming pool, perfect for both children and adults. Sunbeds & tropical style umbrellas decorate the pool area.

All Studios & Apartments have private balconies where one can enjoy incredible views of the sunrise and the breathtaking ocean. Each apartment or studio has a fully equipped kitchenette, refrigerator & a small living room to have your meals. The apartments are on the top floor & the studios are on ground level. All are furnished with traditional handmade furniture.
items.excerpt: Anna Traditional Apartments is a complex of fully furnished traditional homes and build with love & respect to the island's tradition and architecture.

amenities.item: A large swimming pool with sunbeds & tropical style umbrellas
All Studios & Apartments have private balconies
Each apartment or studio has a fully equipped kitchenette, refrigerator & a small living room

tabs.title: Good to Know:
tabs.description: Anna Traditional Apartments has a large swimming pool, perfect for both children and adults.

items.intro_text: Welcome to Anna Traditional Apartments Santorini

items.title: Aplai Dome Santorini
items.description:
Welcome to Aplai Dome Santorini

Aplai Dome is a new hotel built in absolute accordance with the traditional Santorinian style. 

In absolute harmony with island’s architecture Aplai Dome is built in Oia’ s area. It is only 170 meters far from Oia’s centre where you can admire the unique and worldwide known Caldera of Santorini and at the same time to visit high aesthetic shops, cafes, bars and restaurants.

In very close distance and only 2 kilometers from Aplai Dome is the exotic and known for its volcanic rocks Kouloymbos beach, the organized beach Baxe and for the more adventurous of you one kilometer far from Aplai Dome is the Ammodi, the old port of Santorini, with a lot of traditional fish taverns and the Sant Nikolas island which challenge you to dive in the blue Aegean sea.

In the center of the Aplai Dome complex dominates a minimalist design swimming pool with hydromassage, while its rooms have a private veranda with stunning views of the sunset of Oia and the endless blue of the Aegean Sea.

Aplai Dome is 10 km from Fira Town, 12 km from the port and 11 km from the airport. It has luxurious facilities like spa, gym, air conditioning, wi-fi, TV, fridge, sink, electric hotplate, safe box, hairdryer. The wonderful pool area is ideal for relaxing moments and for enjoying your breakfast with coffee, snacks, drinks, sunbathing all day long or reading under the umbrellas until the evening, when the sun falls into the blue of the Aegean Sea.

At a glance: 

2017 Built 

14 apartments

Located in Thalos 

Operating season: April – October
items.excerpt: Aplai Dome is a new hotel built in absolute accordance with the traditional Santorinian style.

tabs.title: Good to Know:
tabs.description: Aplai Dome is a new hotel built in absolute accordance with the traditional Santorinian style.

items.title: Abelonas Retreat|Sunset & Sunrise Lodgings
items.description:
Welcome to Abelonas Retreat|Sunset & Sunrise Lodgings

Located in the marvelous village of Imerovigli, just a mere 2 km from the bustling capital of Fira, Abelonas Retreat combines the perfect accommodation for endless relaxing moments, along with easy accessibility to the vibrant and busy lifestyle of the Therans…day and night. Imerovigli has been named “The Balcony of the Aegean” and for a very good reason. 

This is in fact the pinnacle of the island, perched on a cliff top that overlooks the infinite blue sea and the Theran archipelago. An oasis of calm is waiting to welcome you for a unique experience on the island of Santorini, unveiling its most magical scenery.

Abelonas Retreat is composed of 13 studios, suites and maisonettes, each in line with the Cycladic architecture and the most refined stylistic approach that captures the island’s identity. Whether you are a morning person or you love watching the sun melt into the deep blue sea, you are more than welcome to choose the lodging that will make your dreams come true. Some of the lodgings showcase an outstanding sunrise view, while others open up to the earth-shuttering sunset…both a source of inspiration and not only to the romantic at heart!

Throughout the day, enjoy the shimmering sun in between your dives in the modern outdoor swimming pool. Lay back on the sun loungers, order a fruity cocktail or a healthy snack and just appreciate the moment. And when it is time for the sunset, a unique masterpiece of nature unfolds before your eyes. The sun dips in the sea and thousands of chromatic hues spread on the sky, sparkling and bright…A fusion like no other, where the natural elements join forces and create a moment in time to remember…till the next one, here at Abelonas Retreat | Sunset & Sunrise lodgings in Santorini!
items.excerpt: Located in the marvelous village of Imerovigli, just a mere 2 km from the bustling capital of Fira, Abelonas Retreat combines the perfect accommodation for endless relaxing moments, along with easy accessibility to the vibrant and busy lifestyle of the Therans…day and night.

tabs.title: Good to Know:
tabs.description: Imerovigli has been named “The Balcony of the Aegean” and for a very good reason.

items.intro_text: Welcome to Abelonas Retreat|Sunset & Sunrise Lodgings

items.title: Acqua Vatos Hotel Santorini
items.description:
Welcome to Acqua Vatos Hotel Santorini

Acqua Vatos combines the charm of a family beach hotel with the style of a cosmopolitan retreat and a romantic sanctuary.

Following a revamp in 2013, the slick 32 room-and-suites boutique hotel has emerged as an intriguing and captivating island retreat of unique style, masterfully merging playful pop design with a traditional flair and children-friendly features.

The juxtaposition of the warm, yet discreet, service with the hip aesthetics represents an innovative and appealing hospitality scenario; a scenario that revolves around a spectacular location, equally catering for couples in love, families and restless party animals.

Acqua Vatos’ most incredible trait is that it allows its guests to savour hours of relaxation and invigorating serenity at its peaceful and absolutely quiet rooms or even its private vineyard, despite the property’s proximity to the hustle and bustle of Kamari -a famous beach resort that hosts hip boutiques, inviting restaurants and fish taverns, cafes, bars and vibrant nightclubs.

Guests may enjoy the pleasures of the sea all day long at the sandy beach, relax by the hotel’s extra large swimming pool while sipping a cocktail at the bar, explore the island’s gastronomy scene or stroll through the charming town greeted by the locals. After dark you may opt to watch a new film at the open-air cinema or rub shoulders with beautiful, young types at the island’s most lively bars and nightclubs.

Time flies in Santorini’s most popular beach resort, which manages to effortlessly enchant all its visitors who may be wildly different, but all share one common passion: the passion for the unsurpassed hospitality of a welcoming and exciting beach hotel. The Acqua Vatos hospitality.
items.excerpt: Acqua Vatos combines the charm of a family beach hotel with the style of a cosmopolitan retreat and a romantic sanctuary.

amenities.item: Boutique beach side hotel – category 3* superior
Located on Kamari Beach, Santorini Island, Greece

tabs.title: Good to Know:
tabs.description: Acqua Vatos combines the charm of a family beach hotel with the style of a cosmopolitan retreat and a romantic sanctuary.

items.intro_text: Welcome to Acqua Vatos Hotel Santorini

items.title: Asteras Villas
items.description:
Welcome to Asteras Villas

The wonderful Asteras Villas are a precious jewel managed by a courteous, professional and friendly team, passionate about adding the personal touches that make a stay truly memorable…

Perched atop the majestic Caldera cliffs, looking down towards the endless Aegean Blue, Asteras Villas is a place where luxury dreams become reality. 

While on one side the property enjoys stunning uninterrupted views over the sea, on the other it is just a few steps away from the pebbled main street of Fira, the capital city of the magical island of Santorini.

The Asteras Villas are just a precious jewel managed by a courteous team of extremely professional members that are there to put their touches in making your stay an even more memorable one.

Each suite offers to the distinctive guest breathtaking views to the Caldera, Thirassia Island, the famous volcano and the traditional village of Oia. The overlook from the suites is stunning; the eye continues its endless traveling above blue and the daylight surrenders to the twilight glow. The sun dives to the tranquil golden-blue horizon-line offering ungrudgingly a dramatic breathtaking scenery. Nothing compares to the sunset from the Caldera of Santorini; probably the most romantic and definitely the most photographed sunset on earth
items.excerpt: Perched atop the majestic Caldera cliffs, looking down towards the endless Aegean Blue, Asteras Villas is a place where luxury dreams become reality.

amenities.item: The most centrally located hotel in Fira
All suites have magnificent views of the Aegean Sea, volcano and sunset
Especially for honeymooners: candles and rose petals in the room and a bottle of champagne upon arrival

tabs.title: Good to Know:
tabs.description:
Check in: 15:00

Check out: 11:00

items.title: Athermi Suites Santorini
items.description:
Welcome to Athermi Suites Santorini

A compelling blend of legendary old-school hospitality in an unsurpassed location. Athermi Suites invites you to experience Santorini at its purest and most overwhelming.

A domestic and stylish atmosphere combined with exceptionally personalised service that affords guests an intimate glimpse of everyday life on Santorini, without sacrificing comfort or privacy.

Walk through the picturesque wooden gates of Athermi Suites and feel the embrace of its warm, personalised and discreet service that will make you feel right at home. All

suites boast big verandas facing the sea, and their interiors in simple, elegant, Cycladic style perfectly complement the majestic views over the Aegean.

A compelling blend of unsurpassed location and legendary old-school hospitality, Athermi Suites invites you to experience Santorini at its purest and most overwhelming. Let the loving couple Maria and Kosmas welcome and pamper you at what is more than just a place to stay. As soon as you cross the picturesque wooden gates of Athermi Suites you will feel the embrace of its warm, personalised and discreet service that will make you feel right at home. 

The simple, elegant interiors in the internationally famous local Cycladic style complement the majestic views over the Aegean in absolute harmony, as all suites boast big verandas facing the sea.For a refreshing dip you may opt for the property’s sensational pool, one of the largest in the Caldera. But whatever you do, make sure you do not miss the opportunity to indulge in Maria’s special treats, prepared especially for you. In Santorini’s lesser known Megalohori village, couples and families will discover a slice of paradise.

  • Boutique cliffside hotel – category 3* superior
  • Accommodation: 9 suites & maisonettes
  • Located in the village of Megalochori, Santorini Island, Greece
  • Built in 2009
  • Distances: airport 12Km & port 4Km
  • Operating season: April to October
items.excerpt: Walk through the picturesque wooden gates of Athermi Suites and feel the embrace of its warm, personalised and discreet service that will make you feel right at home.

amenities.item: Ideal for wedding ceremonies at the hotel’s chapel, and wedding receptions by the pool
One of only a few 3* superior new boutique hotels on the cliffside
All suites have magnificent views of the Aegean Sea, volcano and sunset

tabs.description:
Check in: 15:00

Check out: 11:00

items.title: Cloud 9
items.description:
Welcome to Cloud 9

Heavenly moments of amazing vacations are waiting for you and your loved ones at Cloud 9 which is nestled in the heart of the colorful volcanic rocks of the famous Caldera, just 400 m above the sea level.Only a few minutes away from the cosmopolitan capital of Santorini island, the two villas are fully equipped with all the facilities you ever dreamed of, offering comfort and satisfaction. These two luxurious villas feature a minimalistic modern decor, mixing high class facilities and breathtaking sea views.

Each suite is stylishly decorated while both possess a heated outdoor Jacuzzi and a heated swimming pool. At Ariadne villa you may also choose among two heated swimming pools, one indoor and one outdoor plus a steam room that provides you with memorable moments of warmth.If you wish to step out of the ordinary in a magic world of lavishness, Cloud 9 suites are the place to awaken your senses, granting you with a wide range of amenities for an even sweeter accommodation!

At a glance 

  • Two amazing villas nestled on the highest point of Caldera
  • Located in Imerovigli village’ Santorini island’ Greece
  • Operating season: March to November
items.excerpt: Only a few minutes away from the cosmopolitan capital of Santorini island, the two villas are fully equipped with all the facilities you ever dreamed of, offering comfort and satisfaction.

amenities.item: Two amazing villas nestled on the highest point of Caldera
Private sea view terrace with double day bed, chairs and table (Both Villas)

tabs.title: Good to Know:
tabs.description: Each suite is stylishly decorated while both possess a heated outdoor Jacuzzi and a heated swimming pool.

items.title: Opera Mansion Villa Santorini
items.description:
Welcome to Opera Mansion Villa Santorini

The old emblematic Opera of Santorini dating back to the 19th century has been totally renovated, transformed into the absolute epitome of luxury in the heart of the island. In perfect alignment with the traditional Theran architecture, the Opera Mansion is a cave-like building boasting ample spaces and splendidly lavish features. In the very same place where the first modern Hellenic Theatre performance was held, couples relax and enjoy a luxurious stay , combining the scent of traditional Santorini with state-of-the-art amenities, private pools and amazing volcano view , just a breath from the imposing caldera and the central Fira path.

Opera Mansion provides the idyllic setting for couples seeking to isolate themselves from the world, without lacking anything in terms of smooth accessibility to the vibrant nightlife and omnipresent lifestyle of Fira.

Upon reaching Opera Mansion, our team of professionals welcomes you to a whole new level of discreet services where privacy is never compromised and there is still always someone to tend to your every need or desire. From the special breakfast served in the vastness of the mansion with a fine selection of freshly baked pastries and high-quality ingredients to the concierge services eager to organize a private candlelight dinner under the starlit sky, you experience the ultimate fusion of romance, luxurious attentiveness and care.

At a glance:

  • Central location
  • Operating season: April to October
items.excerpt: Opera Mansion provides the idyllic setting for couples seeking to isolate themselves from the world, without lacking anything in terms of smooth accessibility to the vibrant nightlife and omnipresent lifestyle of Fira.

amenities.item: Private sea view deck with sun loungers and parasol
Underground Wine Cellar fully stocked with a fine selection of wines and dining table
Helicopter services, Yacht hiring Diving & snorkeling activities upon request

tabs.title: Good to Know:
tabs.description: The old emblematic Opera of Santorini dating back to the 19th century has been totally renovated, transformed into the absolute epitome of luxury in the heart of the island.

items.intro_text: Welcome to Opera Mansion Villa Santorini

items.title: Villa Dakoronia
items.description:
Welcome to Villa Dakoronia Santorini

‘Villa Dakoronia’ was recently renovated from an old theran villa and is situated on the top of the cliff ridge along the traditional caldera path between Fira and Firostefani, facing the spectacular Caldera view.

Villa Dakoronia encompasses all special features composing luxury living in a privileged spot of the island. On the caldera path connecting Fira and Firostefani, this luxurious villa offers a truly wonderful holiday experience.

Aesthetically supreme and lavishly decorated, designed with comfort and practicality in mind, Villa Dakoronia guarantees the optimal lodging for everyone seeking privacy, serenity and incomparable views to the infinite blue of the Aegean Sea, the fierce rock formations of the caldera and the emblematic volcano.
items.excerpt: Villa Dakoronia’ was recently renovated from an old theran villa and is situated on the top of the cliff ridge along the traditional caldera path between Fira and Firostefani.

amenities.item: An authentic accommodation in the heart of exquisite Imerovigli village Santorini island
Consisting of two suites and four double studios

tabs.title: Good To Know
tabs.description: Villa Dakoronia encompasses all special features composing luxury living in a privileged spot of the island.

items.title: NAXOS
items.description: NAXOS
items.excerpt: NAXOS

items.title: Apricot & Sea Luxury Villas Naxos
items.description:
Apricot & Sea has created for you the ultimate combination of comfort, luxury and traditional Cycladic architecture in the gorgeous scenery of Orkos beach. With outmost respect and love for the environment of Naxos, Apricot & Sea residences are completely integrated in the ancient rocks of Orkos while the soothing sound of waves is bringing a sense of calm and relaxed atmosphere.

At Apricot & Sea we are well aware that your vacation is precious and this is why our residences are fully equipped with everything you may need. However in case there is something that can make your stay even more comfortable and enjoyable all you need to do is ask for it.

Prepare your senses for magical moments gazing at the endless blue of the sea and sky of our beloved island. Experience Naxos in comfort at Apricot & Sea!
items.excerpt: Apricot & Sea has created for you the ultimate combination of comfort, luxury and traditional Cycladic architecture in the gorgeous scenery of Orkos beach.

tabs.title: Good to Know:
tabs.description: Apricot & Sea has created for you the ultimate combination of comfort, luxury and traditional Cycladic architecture in the gorgeous scenery of Orkos beach.

items.intro_text: Welcome to Apricot & Sea Luxury Villas Naxos

items.title: Naxian Queen Luxury Villas & Suites
items.description:
Welcome to Naxian Queen Luxury Villas & Suites

50 meters from the famous Agia Anna Beach, and just 5 km from the town of Naxos is located Naxian Queen Luxury Villas & Suites. The complex offers panoramic views of the pool, the garden and the Aegean Sea. The Naxian Queen constructed following the original Cycladic architecture. 

It is a complex of luxurious villas and suites that offer all modern amenities. The complex’s pool is great, also operates a children’s pool. Snack bar coffee can enjoy snacks and drinks. In the reception area there is a library where you can rent a book of your choice.
items.excerpt: 50 meters from the famous Agia Anna Beach, and just 5 km from the town of Naxos is located Naxian Queen Luxury Villas & Suites.

items.title: MYKONOS
items.description: MYKONOS
items.excerpt: MYKONOS

items.title: Pietra E Mare Mykonos
items.description:
Welcome to Pietra E Mare Mykonos

Set on an oceanfront cliff overlooking the Aegean Sea and Kalo Livadi, Pietra e Mare is re-constructed in a minimal style with fine elegance. Stylish and spacious with breath-taking views, the 31 guest rooms offer ultimate relaxation moments.

The Pietra e Mare 4 star Hotel in Kalo Livadi Mykonos, Greece features 30 beautiful sea view rooms and honeymoon suites tastefully furnished to combine the fine coziness of the Cycladic tradition with modern facilities and contemporary design. Guests are invited to experience the most unforgettable holidays in this luxury beach hotel in Kalo Livadi Mykonos.

Perfectly located in the picturesque Kalo Livadi, just 12 km away from Mykonos town, the beautiful beach hotel is overlooking the azure waters of the Aegean Sea. As a proud member of the Small Luxury Hotels of the World, Pietra e Mare combines unparalleled services and leading luxury in an exceptional setting, inviting guests to experience memorable moments of calm and serenity.

Indulge yourself in a culinary fiesta at our brand new A la carte restaurant overlooking the Aegean Sea or chill out by the bar. Located at the highest level of the property, our restaurant which accommodates up to 25 persons is open for breakfast, lunch and dinner, with exclusive signature courses, based on Mediterranean & Greek cuisine. Breakfast is Buffet style, with a wide selection of A La Carte warm dishes.

Our outdoor fresh water pool features queen size sunbeds for your relaxation and a monasterial style table, ideal for reading or enjoying a quick snack. Our private beach with sunbeds and umbrellas and our intimate garden lounge area with hammocks & cushions between the palm trees turn into the ultimate hideaway.
items.excerpt: Set on an oceanfront cliff overlooking the Aegean Sea and Kalo Livadi, Pietra e Mare is re-constructed in a minimal style with fine elegance.

tabs.title: Good to Know:
tabs.description: Set on an oceanfront cliff overlooking the Aegean Sea and Kalo Livadi, Pietra e Mare is re-constructed in a minimal style with fine elegance.

items.intro_text: Welcome to Pietra E Mare Mykonos

items.title: Boheme
items.description:
Welcome to Boheme

Experience Mykonos in a way you will never forget! Just a stone’s throw from the unique Mykonian Windmills and the popular Little Venice, Bohème is a Mykonos Town Luxury Hotel, built according to the traditional Cycladic architecture standards, with luxurious suites, some of them with outdoor Jacuzzi and Bohemian facilities.

BE LAVISH, BE ALIVE, BE YOURSELF…BE BOHEME!

With impeccable service and contemporary, naturally modern style, the retreat offers high levels of hospitality coupled with untouched privacy.

The hotel’s team offers personalized concierge services on car rental, excursions, reservations, transfers, massage sessions and spa treatments, satisfying the variety of every personal request…Discover the coordinates of the ultimate serenity, well hidden in Boheme’s heart.

With unobstructed views of the sunset & the Aegean Sea, flavors & aromas of a long tradition blended with innovating ideas, inspiring tunes, framed by the island’s positive vibes, the Bilo Bar is a meet & mingle must!

The in-house mixologist & more will amaze you with drinks and cocktails, wines & bubbles, starting around sunset time. Before the night stroll in Little Venice & Mykonos’ mazy alleys, be part of the perfect scenery to socialize! An alternative menu, in absolute harmony with the drink list, includes refreshing & simple options.

Situated by the pool, with breathtaking Sea views and providing a Mediterranean locally sourced cuisine based on the seasonal products of the sea and land of Mykonos, during lunch and dinner hours. Feel free to stroll around our gardens and hand-pick your favorite ingredient as a base for your meal. Drinks and cocktails served by the bar and lounge area, enjoying the breathtaking sunset views of Mykonos, accompanied with inspiring vibes.

Boheme is located 2 minutes walking distance from Mykonos town, having a unique sunset view to the island of Delos and panoramic sea views.

Bohème Mykonos Hotel at a glance

  • Consisting of 20 Suites with spacious balconies or verandas
  • Located in 2 minutes walking distance from Mykonos town
  • Mykonos Island – Greece
  • Distances: Airport 2Km, Port (old /new) 2 & 4Km,
  • 300 m. to town, 15 m. to seaside
  • Operating Season: April to October
items.excerpt: Experience Mykonos in a way you will never forget!

amenities.item: 300 m. to town, 15 m. to seaside

items.title: PAROS
items.description: PAROS
items.excerpt: PAROS

items.title: Acqua Vatos Paros
items.description:
Welcome to Acqua Vatos Paros

Right in the very heart of Cyclades, Paros stands out and offers the ultimate retreat to those in search of heaven on Earth! Acqua Vatos Paros is a boutique hotel that is being fully renovated in 2017 and will operate upon completion of the renovation, located superbly in Parikia. 

A complex of 12 rooms, modernly decorated and boasting unique proximity to the beach of Parikia and the harbor, as well as the vibrant nightlife of the capital, is waiting to dazzle you.

Acqua Vatos Paros provides the idyllic scenery for guests to enjoy friendly and cozy accommodation with the highest hospitality standards.

In line with the traditional Cycladic architecture, following the marvelous canvas of Cyclades where the endless blue of the sky is blended with the whitewashed houses, each room offers just the perfect place for guests to relax and enjoy their stay on Paros.

With respect to the distinctive Cycladic architecture, white and blue colors and ample spaces, infinite sunshine and exquisite facilities, our hotel guarantees supreme stay in Paros. Feel the marvel of Paros from the finest spot of the island, just a stone’s throw from all the points of interest that add to your overall holiday experience. Discover the authentic beauty of Greece and make the most of your vacations at Acqua Vatos Paros!

Key feature & selling points

  • 2017 Fully renovated Boutique Hotel
  • Contemporary Design
  • Family Destination- Friendly & Relaxed Atmosphere
  • Exquisite location in the most privileged location of Paros
  • Located in town, within walking distance from the beach of Paroikia
  • Free Greek Buffet Breakfast
  • Easily accessible both on foot and by car
